body_html:
DistributedDataParallel is what would work with anything non-standard neural network, such as distributions, RNNs with batch as 2nd dimension, etc.
I suggest you use that instead of DataParallel to make your life easier.
body_text:
DistributedDataParallel is what would work with anything non-standard neural network, such as distributions, RNNs with batch as 2nd dimension, etc.
I suggest you use that instead of DataParallel to make your life easier.
body:
DistributedDataParallel is what would work with anything non-standard neural network, such as distributions, RNNs with batch as 2nd dimension, etc.
I suggest you use that instead of DataParallel to make your life easier.
